name: Usersnap
description: Usersnap - Visual annotated feedback via screenshots for web projects at any stage. The #team: @fdorfbauer @dorfbauer @josef_trauner @bogomep

apis.name: Usersnap
apis.description: Usersnap is a visual feedback tool for website owners, allowing users and administrators to create screenshots of user browser content. Additionally, users can annotate or draw on screenshots. The Usersnap API provides a Restful interface for automating Usersnap integration through a variety of GET and POST calls. Responses are JSON formatted.
